OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference

1 The SQL-ODBC Library

This chapter discusses Functional Developer's database interoperability support. It assumes a basic knowledge of SQL and Microsoft's Open Database ConnectivityTM (ODBC) interface.
